info.name: Annotator
info.author: Erin Bell
info.description: Adds AnnotatorJS scripts to Omeka items, files, and pages, allowing users to highlight and annotate text. Annotations are moderated at hypothes.is (account required).
info.tags: comments, annotation, annotator, annotatorjs, hopothesis, social, text

info.name: Annotator
info.author: Erin Bell
info.description: Adds hypothes.is scripts to Omeka items and collections, allowing registered hypothes.is users to highlight and annotate text.
info.tags: comments, annotation, annotator, annotatorjs, hypothesis, social, text

info.name: Element Types
